text: Dala Airport, or Borlänge Airport (IATA:BLE IACO:ESSD) is 7.4 kilometers southeast of downtown Borlänge, in Dalarna, Sweden. Commercial flights have flown from there since the 1960s. The airport was built during World War II. The airport has domestic flights to Malmö, and Örebro. Air Europa has charter flights to Palma de Mallorca and Gran Canaria. Category:Airports in Sweden
title: Dala Airport
